name: Monstrous Seasoning
description: Project Monstrous Seasoning is an open world survival game in which you fight monsters by seasoning, frying or slicing them in order to sustain your tavern by selling monstrous dishes. Maybe you’ll eventually earn enough money to upgrade your tavern, find enough wood to build a fence and cultivate some farmland, or you just hunt down the most delicious monsters in all the land. As seasons change there might even be different monsters to season.
